# Data Exploration and Pre-processing

```{r}
colSums(is.na(Claims_dat))
```

No missing values.

```{r}
convertYN <- c(14:18, 28:39)

Claims_dat[, convertYN] <- lapply(Claims_dat[, convertYN], function(x) ifelse(x == "Yes", 1, 0))
```
